text: Visualize an image of an adorable green frog, with bright, round eyes, wearing small swimming goggles resting neatly above its eyes. The frog is in an unusual yet charming scenario where it's placed in a scenario typically associated with humans. The frog is sitting at a wooden desk, surrounded by office stationery. A computer monitor, keyboard, and coffee mug can be seen on the desk. The frog is trying to reach up and click on the mouse buttons using its tiny froggy fingers, portraying a semblance of a human daily work life.
